title: Scenario toss coins into coffee can - ethics

content.question: Which of the following violations of ethical guidelines occurs in the study?

choices.label: Violation of the right to withdraw

content.answer: Violation of the right to withdraw

topic.text: 4.5: Social-Cognitive and Trait Theories of Personality

skill.text: 2.D: Evaluate whether a psychological research scenario followed appropriate ethical procedures.
